refnamediv.refpurpose: Starts or stops the journaling of MGED commands to a file.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Starts or stops the journaling of MGED commands to a file. If executed with no arguments, the command stops journaling. If journal_file_name is provided, that file will become the recipient of the journaling. If a -d option is also provided, the journaling will include the delays between commands. Journaling is off by default.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the journal command to start the journaling of a specified file.
